description: Time slice for the first year of the ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 (high forcing scenario) experiment. Run for 10 years.
long_name: SSTs, forcings, and other prescribed conditions from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5
rationale: To assess radiative forcing of G6sulfur and G6solar at the beginning of the simulation (2020).

requirements.description: Timeslice, begin in 2020 and run for 10 years.
requirements.label: 2020-2029 10yrs

requirements.description: Sea surface temperature climatology calculated from the ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 experiment for the year 2020.
requirements.label: SSP5-85 SST 2020

requirements.description: Sea ice concentration climatology calculated from the ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 experiment for the year 2020.
requirements.label: SSP5-85 SIC 2020

requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
requirements.label: RCP85 Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the beginning of year 2020 of the SSP5-8.5 experiment.
requirements.keywords: initial conditions, initialisation, ssp5-8.5, year 2020, scenario
requirements.label: SSP5-85Initialisation2020

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
